alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 4:02AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN STEARNS COUNTY THROUGH 500 AM CDT... At 402 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Paynesville, or 24 miles northeast of Willmar, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sauk Centre, Melrose, Albany, Paynesville, Holdingford, Freeport, New Munich, Greenwald, Elrosa, Meire Grove, Lake Henry, and Roscoe. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 127 and 148. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 151 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
